elements.name: panel1
elements.title: What is meant by the following terms? Explain.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Right of withdrawal:
elements.correctAnswer: Right of withdrawal means that the buyer has the right to withdraw from the purchase contract.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Statute of limitations:
elements.correctAnswer: The statute of limitations means that a right, for example a monetary debt, can no longer be claimed by legal action because the period in which the claim could be legally enforced has expired.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: What breaches of the sales contract can occur on the part of the buyer and the seller? Name these.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Buyer:
elements.correctAnswer: Default of acceptance, default of payment
